In "Amen.", Ulrich Mühe portrays a German SS officer trying to inform the Pope about Jews being sent to extermination camps, while in "Inglourious Basterds", Quentin Tarantino weaves an engaging story about Jewish U.S. soldiers plotting to assassinate Nazi leaders. I'd highly recommend either of these films to deepen your understanding and appreciate the complexities of that historical period.
